meanings.definition: Causing or capable of causing genetic mutation.
meanings.sent1: Exposure to mutagenic substances can lead to changes in DNA.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying the effects of mutagenic chemicals on cells.
meanings.sent3: The mutagenic potion turned the frog into a prince!
meanings.sent4: Her ideas were like mutagenic seeds, spreading and changing everything around her.
meanings.sent5: The radioactive spider bite had a mutagenic impact on Peter Parker, giving him superpowers.
